parsing_result:
# Accessories from Fujifilm

## Leather cases
**BLC-XE4:** A case made from genuine leather. Pictures can be taken and batteries and memory cards inserted or removed with the camera still in its case.

## Grip belts
**GB-001:** Improves grip. Combine with a hand grip for more secure handling.

## Handgrips
**MHG-XE4:** Makes the camera easier to hold. Pictures can be taken and batteries and memory cards inserted or removed with the camera still in its case.

## Thumb rests
**TR-XE4:** When inserted into the camera hot shoe, the thumb rest improves your grip and prevents unintended operation of camera controls.

## instax SHARE printers
**SP-1/SP-2/SP-3:** Connect via wireless LAN to print pictures on instax film.
